attributes.action: Include tube and train drivers in the list of professions that are not permitted to strike.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tube and rail staff perform a job that is vital to London's economy. 
The impact of their action outweighs their selfish, petty wage dispute. They must be added to the list of professions that are not allowed to strike. 

If this is not possible under EU legislation, then the Army Reserves should be trained and drafted in to keep trains and tubes running for the duration of the dispute.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
